tool_description: get the latest news in the world of business market
title: business news daily

api_list.name: Get all business news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the current business market news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.headLine: Is the bubble going to burst for FAANG, letâ€™s find out?
body.subHeadline: Barring Facebook and Netflix, to a certain extent, other giants have delivered confidence-boosting earnings, which shows that their businesses are on a sound footing to face the challenges of the macroeconomic environment

body.headLine: View: A storm developing in bond street
body.subHeadline: YTD 2022, the benchmark 10yr yield has seen a sharp surge, rising over 55bps. With this the benchmark yields are higher by 100bps from 2020 lows. The higher yields have however not transmitted to the lending rates.

body.headLine: Gainers & Losers: 5 stocks that moved the most on February 4
body.subHeadline: The benchmark indices closed lower again, with PSU Bank, auto and realty stocks taking a beating
